verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month, the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that certain <S%H376><s%> of the elders <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> <S%H853><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me.
Then came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Are ye <S%H859><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of me? As I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> I will not <S%H518><s%> be inquired <S%H1875><s%> of by you.

Wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> them, son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> them? cause them to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> of their fathers: <S%H1><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I chose <S%H977><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and made myself known <S%H3045><s%> unto them in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto them, saying, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%>

In the day <S%H3117><s%> that I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto them, to bring them forth <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> into <S%H413><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I had espied <S%H8446><s%> for them, flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> lands: <S%H776><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I unto <S%H413><s%> them, Cast ye away <S%H7993><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of his eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and defile not yourselves <S%H2930><s%> <S%H408><s%> with the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

But they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me, and would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me: they did not <S%H3808><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> cast away <S%H7993><s%> <S%H853><s%> the abominations <S%H8251><s%> of their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did they forsake <S%H5800><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> then I said, <S%H559><s%> I will pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, to accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

But I wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name's sake, <S%H4616><s%> <S%H8034><s%> that it should not <S%H1115><s%> be polluted <S%H2490><s%> before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> were, in whose <S%H834><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I made myself known <S%H3045><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, in bringing them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
Wherefore I caused them to go <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

And I gave <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H853><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and showed <S%H3045><s%> them my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> he shall even live <S%H2421><s%> in them.

Moreover also <S%H1571><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> them <S%H853><s%> my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> to be <S%H1961><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and them, that they might know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them.

But the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> they walked <S%H1980><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> he shall even live <S%H2421><s%> in them; and my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> they greatly <S%H3966><s%> polluted: <S%H2490><s%> then I said, <S%H559><s%> I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to consume <S%H3615><s%> them.

But I wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name's sake, <S%H4616><s%> <S%H8034><s%> that it should not <S%H1115><s%> be polluted <S%H2490><s%> before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought them out. <S%H3318><s%>

Yet also <S%H1571><s%> I <S%H589><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> unto them in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that I would not <S%H1115><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had given <S%H5414><s%> them, flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the glory <S%H6643><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> lands; <S%H776><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> they despised <S%H3988><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and walked <S%H1980><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> but polluted <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths: <S%H7676><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their idols. <S%H1544><s%>

Nevertheless mine eye <S%H5869><s%> spared <S%H2347><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them from destroying <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7843><s%> them, neither <S%H3808><s%> did I make <S%H6213><s%> an end <S%H3617><s%> of them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

But I said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> their children <S%H1121><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> Walk <S%H1980><s%> ye not <S%H408><s%> in the statutes <S%H2706><s%> of your fathers, <S%H1><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> observe <S%H8104><s%> their judgments, <S%H4941><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> defile yourselves <S%H2930><s%> with their idols: <S%H1544><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them;

And hallow <S%H6942><s%> my sabbaths; <S%H7676><s%> and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> a sign <S%H226><s%> between <S%H996><s%> me and you, that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

Notwithstanding the children <S%H1121><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against me: they walked <S%H1980><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> do, <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> he shall even live <S%H2421><s%> in them; they polluted <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> my sabbaths: <S%H7676><s%> then I said, <S%H559><s%> I would pour out <S%H8210><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, to accomplish <S%H3615><s%> my anger <S%H639><s%> against them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Nevertheless I withdrew <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand, <S%H3027><s%> and wrought <S%H6213><s%> for my name's sake, <S%H4616><s%> <S%H8034><s%> that it should not <S%H1115><s%> be polluted <S%H2490><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> in whose <S%H834><s%> sight <S%H5869><s%> I brought them forth. <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> unto them also <S%H1571><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> that I would scatter <S%H6327><s%> them among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> and disperse <S%H2219><s%> them through the countries; <S%H776><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> they had not <S%H3808><s%> executed <S%H6213><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> but had despised <S%H3988><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and had polluted <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and their eyes <S%H5869><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their fathers' <S%H1><s%> idols. <S%H1544><s%>

Wherefore I <S%H589><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them also <S%H1571><s%> statutes <S%H2706><s%> that were not <S%H3808><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> whereby they should not <S%H3808><s%> live; <S%H2421><s%>

And I polluted <S%H2930><s%> them in their own gifts, <S%H4979><s%> in that they caused to pass through <S%H5674><s%> the fire all <S%H3605><s%> that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the womb, <S%H7356><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> I might make them desolate, <S%H8074><s%> to the end <S%H4616><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they might know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Therefore, <S%H3651><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Yet <S%H5750><s%> in this <S%H2063><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> have blasphemed <S%H1442><s%> me, in that they have committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> against me.

For when I had brought <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> for the which <S%H834><s%> I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to them, then they saw <S%H7200><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> high <S%H7311><s%> hill, <S%H1389><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the thick <S%H5687><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> and they offered <S%H2076><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> <S%H853><s%> their sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they presented <S%H5414><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of their offering: <S%H7133><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> also they made <S%H7760><s%> their sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor, <S%H7381><s%> and poured out <S%H5258><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> <S%H853><s%> their drink offerings. <S%H5262><s%>

Then I said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, What <S%H4100><s%> is the high place <S%H1116><s%> whereunto <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> go? <S%H935><s%> And the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof is called <S%H7121><s%> Bamah <S%H1117><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Wherefore <S%H3651><s%> say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Are ye <S%H859><s%> polluted <S%H2930><s%> after the manner <S%H1870><s%> of your fathers? <S%H1><s%> and commit ye whoredom <S%H2181><s%> <S%H859><s%> after <S%H310><s%> their abominations? <S%H8251><s%>

For when ye offer <S%H5375><s%> your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> when ye make your sons <S%H1121><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> pollute yourselves <S%H2930><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your idols, <S%H1544><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> this day: <S%H3117><s%> and shall I <S%H589><s%> be inquired of <S%H1875><s%> by you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%> As I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> I will not <S%H518><s%> be inquired of <S%H1875><s%> by you.

And that which cometh <S%H5927><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> your mind <S%H7307><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be at all, <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1961><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> We will be <S%H1961><s%> as the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> as the families <S%H4940><s%> of the countries, <S%H776><s%> to serve <S%H8334><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> and stone. <S%H68><s%>

As I <S%H589><s%> live, <S%H2416><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with a stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with fury <S%H2534><s%> poured out, <S%H8210><s%> will I rule <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you:

And I will bring you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and will gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of <S%H4480><s%> the countries <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> ye are scattered, <S%H6327><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and with a stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> and with fury <S%H2534><s%> poured out. <S%H8210><s%>

And I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> will I plead <S%H8199><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you face <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H413><s%> face. <S%H6440><s%>

Like as <S%H834><s%> I pleaded <S%H8199><s%> with <S%H854><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will I plead <S%H8199><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
And I will cause you to pass <S%H5674><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the rod, <S%H7626><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> you into the bond <S%H4562><s%> of the covenant: <S%H1285><s%>

And I will purge out <S%H1305><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> among you the rebels, <S%H4775><s%> and them that transgress <S%H6586><s%> against me: I will bring them forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the country <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> where they sojourn, <S%H4033><s%> and they shall not <S%H3808><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

As for you, <S%H859><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Go <S%H1980><s%> ye, serve <S%H5647><s%> ye every one <S%H376><s%> his idols, <S%H1544><s%> and hereafter <S%H310><s%> also, if <S%H518><s%> ye will not <S%H369><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me: but pollute <S%H2490><s%> ye my holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> with your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> and with your idols. <S%H1544><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> in mine holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain, <S%H2022><s%> in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> shall all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of them in the land, <S%H776><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> me: there <S%H8033><s%> will I accept <S%H7521><s%> them, and there <S%H8033><s%> will I require <S%H1875><s%> <S%H853><s%> your offerings, <S%H8641><s%> and the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of your oblations, <S%H4864><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your holy things. <S%H6944><s%>

I will accept <S%H7521><s%> you with your sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor, <S%H7381><s%> when I bring you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of <S%H4480><s%> the countries <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> ye have been scattered; <S%H6327><s%> and I will be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you before <S%H5869><s%> the heathen. <S%H1471><s%>

And ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the country <S%H776><s%> for the which <S%H834><s%> I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> it to your fathers. <S%H1><s%>
